name: House M.D. - Episode 5: Under the Big Top
name_original: House M.D. - Episode 5: Under the Big Top
description:
A middle-aged circus manager is strangled by a horse, leading to a rash of unconnected symptoms. Track down the correct diagnosis by interviewing and examining the patient, running lab tests, searching locations and even performing surgery.

Features

• Join Dr. House and his elite diagnostic team.
• Race against the clock to solve a new medical mystery.
